Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class ActionManager

    Class used to manage Actions and action lifecycle. It consists of components: CombinationHandler and ActionController

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    ActionManager
    Namespace: CommonInterfaces
    Assembly: CommonInterfaces.dll
    Syntax
    public class ActionManager : object, ISerializable<ActionManagerData>, IActionManager
